channel.title: Projects on Sadiva Madaan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sadiva Madaan

item.title: Project 1 : TableNet : Project Overview
item.description: Created TableNet model from scratch using Tensorflow which helps in extracting tabular data from scanned images. Used Marmot data to train the model. Every image had its .xml file which contained all the info about the image. It was a computer segmentation task . Created column masks and table masks of the image with the help of the given .xml file. Used various architectures for encoder like ResNet-50 and VGG-19 .

item.title: Analytics Vidhya Hackathon
item.description: Participated in Computer Vision Hackathon . Problem statement was to predict whether the vehicle is an emergency vehicle or not . Used ResNet-34 to achieve a test accuracy of 94 % Results

item.title: Project 3 : Prediction Model for Detecting Videogameâ€™s Ratings : Project Overview
item.description: Scrapped various reviews of a videogame from metacritic.com using BeautifulSoup. Converted the text data into vectors using tf-idf and bag of words. Data was imbalanced so used SMOT to handle it . Used Gaussian Naive Bayes as a baseline model as it works pretty well for textual data. Link for Github Repo

item.title: Project 2 : Classification of sexual harrasment personal stories : Project Overview
item.description: Our problem is to categorize these personal stories and these stories can belong to multiple classes. We can map it into multi class classification problem. Implemented all the classical Machine Learning algorithms i.e Logistic Regression, SVM, Decision Trees, Gradient Boosting , Cat Boost, XG Boost etc and fine tuned them. Created a custom stacking classifier to classify these stories. Model was deployed using Flask API on Heroku. Link of the web app Project blog Results
